tasks.title: Remove debug logging from JSON parser production code
tasks.description: Eliminate excessive console.log statements in JSONTaskParser for 70% performance gain
tasks.details: Remove or conditionally disable 15+ console.log calls in validateTasksFile method lines 32-80
tasks.testStrategy: Measure task loading time before/after, verify logs only in development mode
tasks.successCriteria: Task loading time reduced by 200-500ms, no logs in production

implementation.summary: Removed 15+ console.log statements from validateTasksFile method (lines 32-80) while preserving all validation logic and error handling

tasks.title: Configure webpack to bundle CSS at build time
tasks.description: Add webpack raw-loader to bundle styles.css content at build time eliminating runtime file reads
tasks.details: Configure webpack.config.js with raw-loader for CSS files and update TaskHTMLGenerator to import bundled CSS
tasks.testStrategy: Verify CSS bundled into JavaScript, no runtime file system access, HTML generation faster
tasks.successCriteria: CSS bundled at build time, no runtime file reads, styling preserved in packaged extension

implementation.summary: Added webpack raw-loader for CSS bundling at build time and updated TaskHTMLGenerator to import bundled CSS instead of runtime file reading

tasks.title: Bundle JavaScript content with webpack raw-loader
tasks.description: Configure webpack to bundle webview.js at build time eliminating runtime file access
tasks.details: Update webpack config to handle .js imports with raw-loader and modify getInlineJavaScript() method
tasks.testStrategy: Verify JS bundled at build time, no file system reads, webview interactions work correctly
tasks.successCriteria: JavaScript bundled at build time, no runtime file reads, all interactive features work

implementation.summary: Added webpack raw-loader rule for JavaScript files and updated TaskHTMLGenerator to import bundled JS instead of runtime file reading

tasks.title: Create performance benchmark test suite
tasks.description: Add automated tests to measure and validate webview rendering performance
tasks.details: Create performance test measuring task loading and HTML generation times
tasks.testStrategy: Benchmark tests pass with <100ms HTML generation, <1000ms total load time
tasks.successCriteria: Performance tests created and passing with target metrics

implementation.summary: Created automated performance benchmark test suite with HTML generation speed tests and CSS bundling validation

tasks.title: Validate overall performance improvement
tasks.description: Measure end-to-end task loading performance and confirm 70-80% improvement
tasks.details: Run comprehensive performance validation across all optimization changes
tasks.testStrategy: End-to-end tests show significant load time reduction, user experience improved
tasks.rollbackStrategy: git revert [commits from PERF-001 through PERF-003]
tasks.successCriteria: Overall task loading performance improved by 70-80% from baseline

implementation.summary: Added end-to-end performance integration tests to validate 70-80% improvement from Phase 1 optimizations

tasks.title: Extract HTML templates to external files
tasks.description: Move large HTML template strings to external .html files for maintainability
tasks.details: Create template files for task items, headers, and complex HTML structures
tasks.testStrategy: HTML rendering unchanged, external files properly loaded, syntax highlighting works
tasks.rollbackStrategy: git checkout HEAD -- src/tasks/providers/ && rm -f src/tasks/templates/*.html
tasks.successCriteria: Templates externalized, no functional changes, improved maintainability

implementation.summary: HTML templates externalized to separate files with caching system and fallback templates for improved maintainability

tasks.title: Implement template file caching system
tasks.description: Create caching mechanism for external HTML template files with asWebviewUri
tasks.details: Load and cache external template files using VSCode filesystem API and webview URIs
tasks.testStrategy: Templates loaded once, proper CSP compliance, webview resources accessible
tasks.successCriteria: External templates cached properly, CSP compliant, performance maintained

implementation.summary: Implemented async template file caching system using VSCode filesystem API with fallback templates for error handling

tasks.title: Add template compilation build step
tasks.description: Create optional build script to pre-compile templates into TypeScript for maximum performance
tasks.details: Build script converts .html templates to optimized TypeScript template functions
tasks.testStrategy: Build script runs successfully, generated templates functional, performance improved
tasks.rollbackStrategy: rm -f scripts/compile-templates.js && git checkout HEAD -- package.json
tasks.successCriteria: Optional template compilation available, performance gain measurable

metadata.description: Performance optimization for VSCode extension webview HTML/CSS/JS handling
